Name: FrontLine - Partnership Banking
Solution: AI-powered relationship management platform integrating LLM with CRM systems and data sources. Solution includes: 1) RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) for customer insights synthesis, 2) Predictive analytics for next best actions, 3) GenAI for meeting prep and communication drafting, 4) Real-time alerts using ML models for relationship health monitoring.
Solution Description (2025 Aligned): 2025 AI-Powered Relationship Platform: Implements Self-Reflective RAG (PT-005) over customer data, meeting notes, and account plans with hybrid search and reranking. Deploys Agentic AI (PT-007) for autonomous meeting preparation with tool orchestration across CRM, Core Banking, and Analytics APIs. Uses Multi-Model Routing (PT-006) to optimize LLM selection (GPT-4 for complex analysis, Claude for reasoning, Llama for simple tasks). Integrates Feature Store (PT-003) for real-time customer behavioral features. Governed by Enterprise AI Governance Platform (PT-001) with full audit trails. Expected: 2-3x increase in qualified leads (McKinsey benchmark).
